custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CTEntry.ctEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregate ON CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries ON CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE (CTEntry.ctEntryId != ?) AND (CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {CTEntry.*} FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregate ON CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries ON CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE (CTEntry.ctEntryId != ?) AND (CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryId = ?)
